sentences: Õpilased peavad olema kursis kõige uuemate teadmisega.
Ta jääb kursis viimasest arengust oma valdkonnas.
context: The Estonian word 'kursis' is an adjective that means being up-to-date, informed, or on track with current information, knowledge, or developments. It indicates that someone has the latest and most relevant information about a particular topic or subject area.
